name: of them that have a name
name_original: of them that have a name
description:
A short game poem about the Vietnam Veterans Memorial in Washington D.C. and a statistic I can't get out of my head.

Use the arrow keys on your keyboard to move. 

Interact with signposts and plaques by walking into them.

This game was made using the Bitsy Game Maker https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy.
